Dentist
Description
The Community Care Dental Clinic is a progressive dental clinic located in Lindsay, Ontario. We are looking for a part-time dentist to work on Fridays, 1 Tuesday per month and 2 Saturdays per month. Title: Vaccines Territory Manager / Territory Associate – Ontario West - Mississauga, ON - Indeed.com
Description:
Site Name:
Canada - Ontario - Mississauga
Posted Date:
Nov 22 2021
POSITION SUMMARY
Reporting directly into the Brand Lead, this field-based role is accountable for developing and implementing sales strategy within their designated territory to achieve & surpass Vaccine sales objectives and enable patients to do more, feel better and live longer.
Senior Manager, Manager and Associate level positions are available which will be offered subject to applicant experience.
This individual will be accountable for a significant portion of the province West of the GTA and could be based out of Guelph/Waterloo/London or nearby area
POSITION RESPONSIBILITIES
Develop and execute business plan for the territory and individual customers to grow the business including setting of appropriate short-term objectives for customer calls to achieve long-term goal.
Key account management and partnering with customers to drive accountability for their business & contractual objectives.
Allocate budget and effectively use internal and external resources to create customer value.
Partner with stakeholders both inside and outside the organization, and work collaboratively to develop effective relationships & create new ideas together to get the best results.
Effectively integrate product knowledge into a relevant & informative dialogue which brings customers an insightful perspective.
Thoroughly understand GSK products, strategies, positioning and POA as well as those of key competitors.
Understand how patients and health care professionals navigate the health care system and integrate these insights in the dialogue with the customer.
Build and maintain network of health care professionals to grow sales of product mix.
Contribute to a great working environment by bringing energy and commitment.
QUALIFICATIONS
Minimum of a Bachelor’s Degree.
3-5 years’ sales experience with a proven track record of strong performance.
Proven track record to proactively identify business opportunities and deliver on strategies to capture new value and drive business growth.
Ability to learn and adapt quickly to new ways of working and identify opportunities for personal development.
High level of business integrity and ethics.
Proven leadership skills and ability to work collaboratively and cross-functionally.
Strong business acumen and analytical skills.
High sense of initiative with a Business Owner mindset.
Highly developed verbal and written communication skills.
Ability to travel domestically as per the requirements of the position (overnight stay & national/regional meetings).
Working knowledge of Word, Excel, PPT and agility to learn new programs.
Valid driver's license*
This position requires the employee to drive routinely on Company business and allows for the provision of a company – leased vehicle. However, to be eligible for this position and a company vehicle, GSK will need to obtain acceptable results from a license verification inquiry and drivers abstract review against its safe driver program requirements
LI-GSK
GSK is an equal opportunity employer committed to diversity and inclusion. We welcome applications from all qualified individuals to apply to our career opportunities. GSK is committed to accommodating persons with disabilities. If you need accommodation at any stage of the application process or want more information on our accommodation policies, please contact us at canada-recruitment@gsk.com. Please do not send resumes to this e-mail and instead apply through the online application process of this posting.
As a health and science-based organization, GSK is committed to following the recommendations as set out by Health Canada and taking all necessary steps to help curb the spread of COVID-19 which includes getting the COVID-19 vaccine. We feel strongly that this is the best way to help protect those we value most: our employees, families, communities and the patients and consumers we serve. To that end, we are taking an important step to ensure the safety of our employees during this global public health crisis.
Only employees who are fully vaccinated against COVID-19 may attend our Mississauga and Laval corporate offices. In addition, all customer-facing employees who, as part of their job, attend healthcare settings such as hospitals, pharmacies, doctors’ offices and dentists’ offices will need to be fully vaccinated against COVID-19. Notwithstanding the foregoing, employees may seek an accommodation for human rights-related reasons, including medical or disability-related conditions, or religious beliefs.
Important notice to Employment businesses/ Agencies
GSK does not accept referrals from employment businesses and/or employment agencies in respect of the vacancies posted on this site. All employment businesses/agencies are required to contact GSK's commercial and general procurement/human resources department to obtain prior written authorization before referring any candidates to GSK. The obtaining of prior written authorization is a condition precedent to any agreement (verbal or written) between the employment business/ agency and GSK. In the absence of such written authorization being obtained any actions undertaken by the employment business/agency shall be deemed to have been performed without the consent or contractual agreement of GSK. GSK shall therefore not be liable for any fees arising from such actions or any fees arising from any referrals by employment businesses/agencies in respect of the vacancies posted on this site.

Title: Student Temp (3-month contract) - Toronto, ON - Indeed.com
Description:
About SciCan
SciCan provides a complete range of infection control solutions for dentists, ophthalmologists and medical clinics in dozens of countries around the world. Much of what we design, build, distribute and maintain is focused on efficiently washing, disinfecting and sterilizing dental and medical instruments.
In the dental industry, we’re known as the maker of the STATIM Cassette Autoclave®. It’s the fastest cassette autoclave out there. But we offer more than just technology, and more than just dental.
Working with industry professionals and regulators, we provide the dental, ophthalmology, and endoscopy markets with the most innovative and effective products available. Our global network of infection control experts develop real-world solutions based on our big-picture understanding of how good design, effective work flow, and sound ergonomics make for better and safer patient care.
From the largest multi-office practice to the smallest clinic, SciCan products are used to carefully and efficiently clean, disinfect and sterilize instruments to fight the spread of diseases like hepatitis B, hepatitis C, and HIV.
What SciCan offers its Employees
A clean and safe working environment
Diverse and Inclusive environment
Promotion of work-life balance
Casual business dress
Work flexibility schedule where the position allows for it
Work from home where the position allows it
Employee discounts program offerings
Competitive Compensation
Benefits: Employer paid health and dental insurance , Employee Assistance program, Employer paid pension contributions
Career Development & Tuition reimbursement
Onsite subsidized Cafeteria serving hot lunches
Easy access to public transit
Employee Referral Program
Wellness Initiative programs
Employee Appreciation Social Events
Opportunities for advancement within the company
An employer that’s involved in the community
Teamwork and ongoing training
A comprehensive training program for all new hires
Student Co-op/Internship program
Growing and yet a family oriented enviornment
And much more!
Job Summary:
We are currently looking for 5 temporary employees for a short-term contract. The contract roles will be 3 months long, and applicants must be available to start immediately. The student temps will be working in Production, supporting Spare parts, for 2-3 days per week, 8 hours per day.
Submitting Applications:
Interested candidates, please e-mail a copy of your resume. Candidates that meet the above requirements will be contacted for an interview. We would like to thank all candidates for their interest in SciCan. No phone calls please.
SciCan is committed to accommodating applicants with disabilities throughout the hiring process, in accordance with the Accessibility for Ontarians with Disabilities Act (AODA). Our Human Resources team is responsible for working with applicants requesting accommodation at any stage of the hiring process.
Contract length: 3 months
Job Types: Part-time, Temporary, Contract
Schedule:
8 hour shift
Work remotely:
No

Title: Dental Receptionist - Kelowna, BC - Indeed.com
Description:
Dr. Sandy Crocker/ Dr. Peter Mitchells office is looking for a full time Dental Receptionist.
Suite 1, 1482 Springfield Road, Kelowna BC
DENTAL EXPERIENCE IS A MUST.
We are searching for a dynamic, passionate Dental Receptionist/Administrator to join our team on a full-time basis. This individual will play a role in supporting the clinics efficiency and the quality of care that our patients receive. The person we are looking for is a team player and is excited to provide assistance and fulfilling all preparation measures for patient arrival.
Our office is very progressive with patient care, as our dentists offer a have a wide variety from restorative and cosmetic treatments, implants, Oral and IV sedation, dentures and more.
We are a digital office including digital x-ray, panoramic x-rays, and are a paperless practice using Power Practice software.
Job Description
This is a full-time position, Monday through Friday with no evenings or weekends.
Our progressive office is centrally located, with free parking.
Benefits include competitive wages based on experience, health spending account, dental benefits, uniform allowance, bonuses and a great opportunity for growth.
Responsibilities include patient care, submitting dental claims, processing payments, scheduling appointments, accounting and related office duties. Strong computer and communication skills are essential.
We are looking for an experienced dental receptionist. Knowledge of Power Practice and Dexis is preferred. Attention to detail and the ability to multi-task will make you a valuable addition to our experienced, supportive team.
To apply, please submit an email to Cathy at email provided
With your resume and references with "Dental Admin" in the subject line.

We are a covid experienced facility. Masks are mandatory, hand sanitization, plexiglass separators, continual sanitizing, new air purifiers.
